column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I had the lunch special
column2: which is a salad and a personal pizza with a drink
column3: plus I ordered a starter of garlic bread. The salad was a typical side salad
column4: so nothing good or bad there. To be fair
column6: but the garlic bread seemed somewhat bland. Definitely needed the marinara sauce on the side to help give it some flavor. The pizza itself was good
column7: but not as good as Giordano's
column9: the lunch special is available on the weekends at Lou Malnati's
column10: which is not true for Giordano's
column11: so if that's what you're after
column12: then Lou Malnati's is not a bad option. If I'm given a choice
